item.description:
Hike along Harwich Reservoirs and River - Park at Sand Pond on Great Western Rd.

An AMC hike, led by AMC member Peter Selig. For more information on the Appalachian Mountain Club, visit outdoors.org.  The hike listing does not specify hike length but these Cape hikes do not go over 2 hours.

Pre-registration is not required. Membership in the AMC is also not required. Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes.

Meet for breakfast at the Red Cottage on Old Bass River Road in South Dennis (Exit 9) at 8:30 if you are interested. (Directions at link above.)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Harwich Herring River
